product_name: New Balance 695 Running Shoes - Boys' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The New Balance 695 Running Shoes for boys have fun colors and a fresh feel, and they are full of function to keep feet comfy from the playground to the classroom and back again. ABZORB(R) cushioning keeps feet comfortable throughout the day. Shoes are designed to stand up to kids' busy days and weekends. Nonmarking outsoles provide good traction. Closeout.
